languages.text: "Мне ведомо, что некоторые скорбят о Вени'Идире. Это неправильно. Она умерла человеком. До того, как скверна пожрала ее душу".

traits.locale_text: "Мне ведомо, что некоторые скорбят о Вени'Идире. Это неправильно. Она умерла человеком. До того, как скверна пожрала ее душу".

languages.text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
languages.original_text: "Мне ведомо, что некоторые скорбят о Вени'Идире. Это неправильно. Она умерла человеком. До того, как скверна пожрала ее душу".

traits.locale_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: «Sé que algunos lamentan el destino de Veni'Idira. No deberían hacerlo. Murió como humana, antes de que la corrupción pudiera devorar su alma».
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: 「ヴェニイディラのことを悲しんでいる者がいることは知っています。嘆くのは間違いだ。彼女は人間として死んだ。腐敗が彼女の魂を飲み込んでしまう前に」
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: “我明白有些人为帷者伊迪拉的死感到悲伤，但这是错误的行为。她死前保持着人类的身份，赶在灵魂被腐化吞噬前迎来了死亡。”
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: "Mir ist bewusst, dass einige um Veni'Idira trauern. Aber das ist falsch. Sie starb als menschliches Wesen. Bevor die Verderbnis ihre Seele verschlingen konnte."
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas sans savoir que certains pleurent Veni'Idira. C'est une erreur. Elle est morte en être humain, avant que la corruption n'engloutisse son âme. »
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
"I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."

languages.text: "Veni'İdira'nın ardından bazılarının yas tuttuğunun farkındayım. Hata ediyorlar. Bir insan olarak, yozlaşma ruhunu tüketmeden evvel öldü."
languages.original_text: "I am aware that some grieve for Veni'Idira. They are wrong to do so. She died a human being. Before corruption could devour her soul."
